ecdTitle: Upgrade to Latest Vulnerability Scanning Software
ecdDescription: This ECD proposes upgrading the vulnerability scanning software used in the Enterprise Security Monitoring System to the latest version. The current version is outdated and lacks support for the latest vulnerabilities and attack vectors. The upgrade will enhance the system's ability to detect and respond to emerging threats.

impactAnalysis.mitigationPlan: Conduct thorough testing in a non-production environment. Implement a phased rollout to minimize service disruption. Coordinate with stakeholders for proper planning and communication.

approvalStages.comments: The proposed upgrade aligns with our security best practices and addresses critical vulnerabilities.
Approved with the condition of implementing the recommended mitigation plan.
Approved. Ensure proper communication and coordination with stakeholders.

implementation.postImplementationReview: A post-implementation review will be conducted within 30 days to assess the effectiveness of the upgrade and identify any areas for improvement.
